doc:
Valerie Mahaffey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valerie_Mahaffey 0 Valerie Mahaffey (born June 16, 1953) is an American TV actress and producer. She won an Emmy Award for her work on Northern Exposure. She later won fame through her portrayal of extroverted and friendly but ultimately insane women on the television shows Wings, Desperate Housewives and Devious Maids. Valerie_Mahaffey ( born June_16_,_1953 ) is an_American_TV_actress_and_producer . She won an_Emmy_Award for her_work on Northern_Exposure . She later won fame through her_portrayal of extroverted_and_friendly_but_ultimately_insane_women on the_television shows Wings , Desperate_Housewives and Devious_Maids .
